QuestData.Title: The Fall of Shan Bu
QuestData.Description:
Lei Shen found a clutch of rare storm dragon eggs early in his campaign. One - known as Nalak - was particularly brutal and killed all of its handlers, so he took it for his own.
Now, Shan Bu, one of Lei Shen's most loyal servants, works to resurrect the dragon.
It is time for us to strike against Shan Bu!
Speak to me when you are ready to launch the assault!
QuestData.RewardText: You've done it, $c! Shan Bu is dead once and for all, and we've learned that Lor'themar may not be all that he seems.

Objectives.Objective: Capture the Foot of Lei Shen
